gw.plugin.policyperiod

Interface IPolicyPeriod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IPolicyPeriod
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IPolicyPeriod plugin provides a hook for customers to add logic having to do with a PolicyPeriod

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyFullPayDiscount(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
      Provides the hook to implement the full pay discount on a policy period
      boolean canTransferCommissionReceiverTo(PolicyCommission newPolicyCommission, InvoiceItem itemToEarn)
      Method that is called when we are about to transfer the given invoice item to begin receiving commission on the given policy commission.
      InvoiceItemPayers getCustomPayersForCancellationCollapsedInvoiceItems(InvoiceItemPayers defaultInvoiceItemPayers)
      Provides a hook to customize the assignment of payers for invoice items being collapsed during PolicyCancellation
      java.util.List<InvoiceItem> getItemsAffectedByBillingMethodChange(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
      Provides a hook to return which items should be moved when the billing method is changed on a policy If policy.isAgencyBill() returns true, the policy is being changed from agency bill to direct bill If policy.isAgencyBill() returns false, the policy is being changed from direct bill to agency bill

      Provides a hook for configurers to update the set of future invoice items that will be collapsed upon policy cancellation just prior to those collapsed invoice items being placed.
      void updatePolicyPeriodInfo(PolicyPeriodInfo policyPeriodInfo)
      Deprecated. 
      (since 8.0.1) The non-persistent entity PolicyPeriodInfo has been replaced by the Gosu Data Transfer Object ("DTO") PolicyPeriodInfoDTO which is where any custom logic originally here should go.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePolicyPeriodInfo

        @Deprecated
void updatePolicyPeriodInfo(PolicyPeriodInfo policyPeriodInfo)
        Deprecated. (since 8.0.1) The non-persistent entity PolicyPeriodInfo has been replaced by the Gosu Data Transfer Object ("DTO") PolicyPeriodInfoDTO which is where any custom logic originally here should go.
        Provides the hook to update/modify the given policyPeriodInfo entity using custom logic. The policyPeriodInfo entity is created and loaded with information and then this method is called by IBillingCenterAPI#getPolicyPeriodInfo(String) before the policyPeriodInfo is returned to an external system.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriodInfo - the PolicyPeriodInfo object that can be modified before returning to external system.

      • applyFullPayDiscount

        void applyFullPayDiscount(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Provides the hook to implement the full pay discount on a policy period
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the PolicyPeriod object that can be modified before returning to external system.

      • getItemsAffectedByBillingMethodChange

        java.util.List<InvoiceItem> getItemsAffectedByBillingMethodChange(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Provides a hook to return which items should be moved when the billing method is changed on a policy If policy.isAgencyBill() returns true, the policy is being changed from agency bill to direct bill If policy.isAgencyBill() returns false, the policy is being changed from direct bill to agency bill
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - affected
        Returns:
        a list of items whose billing method should be changed

      • canTransferCommissionReceiverTo

        boolean canTransferCommissionReceiverTo(PolicyCommission newPolicyCommission,
                                      InvoiceItem itemToEarn)
        Method that is called when we are about to transfer the given invoice item to begin receiving commission on the given policy commission. If this method returns true, we will go ahead and do the transfer, if it returns false, we will skip the item, and the item will remain earning commission on the policy commission it is currently earning on.
        Parameters:
        newPolicyCommission - The policy commission we wish to transfer to
        itemToEarn - The item that is going to begin earning commission on the new policy commission
        Returns:
        True if we should go ahead with this transfer, false if we should skip it

      • getCustomPayersForCancellationCollapsedInvoiceItems

        InvoiceItemPayers getCustomPayersForCancellationCollapsedInvoiceItems(InvoiceItemPayers defaultInvoiceItemPayers)
        Provides a hook to customize the assignment of payers for invoice items being collapsed during PolicyCancellation
        Parameters:
        defaultInvoiceItemPayers - the default specification of payer for each invoice item in the set of invoice items being collapsed during policy cancellation
        Returns:
        the specification of payer for each invoice item that should actually be used by the system when collapsing future invoice items during policy cancellation

      • updateCancellationCollapsedInvoiceItemsBeforePlacement

        void updateCancellationCollapsedInvoiceItemsBeforePlacement(java.util.List<InvoiceItem> invoiceItems,
                                                          java.util.Date cancellationCollapseDate)
        Provides a hook for configurers to update the set of future invoice items that will be collapsed upon policy cancellation just prior to those collapsed invoice items being placed. The primary use of this method is to set the EventDate of each invoice item to an appropriate value (based on the cancellation effective date) such that the invoice item will be placed by the InvoiceAssembler in a desired way.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItems - from the future that are being collapsed due to a policy cancellation. These items will be placed using the InvoiceAssembler immediately after this method is called
        cancellationCollapseDate - is the later of these two dates: the cancellation effective date or the current date

      • hasReceivedSufficientPaymentToConfirmPolicyPeriod

        boolean hasReceivedSufficientPaymentToConfirmPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        This is called when a Payment is applied to the policy period and the policy period's ConfirmationNotificationState is NotifyUponSufficientPayment. The policy period will notify the policy administration system that the policy period has been confirmed if this method returns true, indicating that sufficient payment has been received.

        Return true if the policy period has received sufficient payment to confirm the policy period.

        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period
        Returns:
        whether the policy period has received sufficient payment to be confirmed.
